aka: The Children Of The Hotel America

cast.name: 加比娅·瑞斯库维 Gabija Jaraminaite

writer.name: 马切伊·德拉加斯 Maciej J. Drygas

trans_title: 来自“美国”酒店的孩子们
The Children Of The Hotel America
introduction: about teenagers in Vilnius who are still immensely influenced by Woodstock and decide to hold their own rock love-in on a campsite near a lake. The next morning they are brutally attacked by police who return them to their parents. One of the young couples at this event is separated later when the girl’s family emigrates to Israel. The title of the film belongs to an unofficial club to which these teenagers belong and indicates their fascination with all things American – which is seen as a rebellion against all things Russian.
chinese_title: 来自“美国”酒店的孩子们
